Headline: Loop-bound Brown Line Delays
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Brown Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Kedzie. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Brown Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Kedzie.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #60 Blue Island/26th Temporary Reroute at 26th/Lawndale
ShortDescription: 60 Blue Island/26thbuses are temporarily rerouted via 26th, Pulaski, Cermak, Central Park and 26th: due to, street blockage near 26th/Lawndale.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#60 Blue Island/26thbuses are temporarily rerouted via 26th, Pulaski, Cermak, Central Park and 26th: due to, street blockage near 26th/Lawndale.

Allow extra travel time.
